name: ROOM.EXE
description:
Keep trying doors until you finally lose your mind...

and know.. each run is randomly generated

and gets more intense as you progress.

There is no story nor end but your own.

Cursor keys or WASD  offer control.

Download the PC/LINUX/MAC installer for a HD Experience.

More to come soon ;)
